It features basal rosettes of narrow, lance-shaped leaves with a hairy surface. The plant produces yellow flowers arranged in a composite head, which is surrounded by bracts that are often purple or reddish. Its flowering period typically occurs from late spring to early summer. It is often found in grasslands, wastelands, and along roadsides, thriving in well-drained soils.
